biocontainers.name: clonalframeml
biocontainers.summary: Efficient inference of recombination in whole bacterial genomes

biotools.summary: ClonalFrameML is a maximum likelihood implementation of the Bayesian software ClonalFrame which was previously described by Didelot and Falush (2007). The recombination model underpinning ClonalFrameML is exactly the same as for ClonalFrame, but this new implementation is a lot faster, is able to deal with much larger genomic dataset, and does not suffer from MCMC convergence issues

bioschemas.name: ClonalFrameML
